alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 3:38PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Haskell and central Throckmorton Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 337 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Lake Stamford Marina, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Throckmorton, Woodson, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us- 283, The Intersection Of Us- 283 And Ranch Road 209 and The Intersection Of Us- 380 And Highway 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
